xml.data:
Home » 29Dhs Dhammasaṅgaṇīpāḷi » 2 Niddesa » 2.3 Nikkhepakaṇḍa » 2.3.1 Tikanikkhepa
2.3.1.22 Sanidassanattika
Niddesa
Nikkhepakaṇḍa
Tikanikkhepa
Sanidassanattika
1056.
1721Katame dhammā sanidassanasappaṭighā? Rūpāyatanaṃ—  ime dhammā sanidassanasappaṭighā.
1057.
1722Katame dhammā anidassanasappaṭighā? Cakkhāyatanaṃ, sotāyatanaṃ, ghānāyatanaṃ, jivhāyatanaṃ, kāyāyatanaṃ, saddāyatanaṃ, gandhāyatanaṃ, rasāyatanaṃ, phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ—  ime dhammā anidassanasappaṭighā.
1058.
1723Katame dhammā anidassanaappaṭighā? Vedanākkhandho, saññākkhandho, saṅkhārakkhandho, viññāṇakkhandho; yañca rūpaṃ anidassanaṃ appaṭighaṃ dhammāyatanapariyāpannaṃ; asaṅkhatā ca dhātu—  ime dhammā anidassanaappaṭighā.
1724Tikaṃ.
<< 2.3.1.21 Ajjhattārammaṇattikaup2.3.2 Dukanikkhepa >>
